front.title: OSPFv2 Domain Of Interpretation (DOI) for ISAKMP

abstract.t: The Internet Security Association and Key Management Protocol (ISAKMP) defines a framework for security association management and cryptographic key establishment for the Internet. This framework consists of defined exchanges and processing guidelines that occur within a given Domain of Interpretation (DOI). This document details the OSPFv2 DOI, which is defined to cover the use of ISAKMP to negotiate Security Associations for the OSPFv2 routing protocol.
